NSCameraUsageDescription: We need access to your camera to scan the QR Code of your sensor
NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: We need to have access to the location in order to determine the parcels being processed
NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: We need to have access to the location in order to determine the parcels being processed
NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: We need to have access to the location in order to determine the parcels being processed
